name: CDI_WORKING_PX
description: The CDI_WORKING_PX table contains information related to working procedures for a Clinical Documentation Improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CODING_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coding record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_PX_ID
columns.description: The working procedures for a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_PX_ID_ICD_PX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the ICD procedure record.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_PX_DATE
columns.description: The date of a procedure on a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CDI_WKG_PX_PROV_ID
columns.description: The performing provider of a procedure on a clinical documentation improvement (CDI) review.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique ID of the contact that this coding record is associated with.
